verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] , [V: escalating] [ARG1: its fight with so - called sanctuary cities] , asked the U.S. Supreme Court on Monday to narrow a lower court 's nationwide order preventing the federal government from denying public safety grants to municipalities that limit cooperation on immigration enforcement .
